urn_samm_io.catenax.classified_load_spec.description: Identifier of channel

urn_samm_org.eclipse.esmf.samm_character.description: Describes a Property containing a reference to one of the units in the Unit Catalog.

urn_samm_io.catenax.classified_load_spec.description: Min and max value of classified load range
Number of classes
list of class limits
Full information on loadchannel including name, unit, limits, classes

channelName.description: identifier of the load channel, needed to combine the loading with the damage calculation

unit.description: unit of the corresponding load channel

lowerLimit.description: for classification, a range of load values must be set. The limits and the number of bins decribe the classes.

upperLimit.description: for classification, a range of load values must be set. The limits and the number of bins decribe the classes.

numberOfBins.description: for classification, a range of load values must be set. The limits and the number of bins decribe the classes.

binLimits.description: In case of non- equidistant classes, the limits of the intervalls are given here. Optional, but if given, this list will be used. List must start with lowerLimit and end with upperLimit.

urn_samm_io.catenax.classified_load_spec.description: Full information on loadchannel including name, unit, limits, classes

Specification of counting method. EventCount, PeakCount, MaximunCount  specify the number of events. RangeCount specify the amplitudes of load cycles, Rangedifference of load classes Rainflow describes the number of closed hystersis fron one class to another class. Different procedures exists , the default is 4-point-method. If 3-point-method or HCM method is used, the corresponding values should be used. LRD means load revolution distribution describing the load spectra for gear sets.
By default, the number of for example events or peaks are counted. Value should be given if for example time or revolutions are counted.
Information on the classified load spectrum including kind of classificationen, Classes, Limits

channels.description: Full information on loadchannel including name, unit, limits, classes

countingMethod.description: Type of classification: rainflow or event counting or load revolution distribution

countingValue.description: Optional. By default, the number of for example events or peaks are counted. Value should be given if for example time or revolutions are counted.

countingUnit.description: depending on counted value: if revolutions are counted, counted unit might be 1/min or 1/s.  Required, default is "/", which means no unit.

urn_samm_io.catenax.classified_load_spec.description: List of load classes
Name of the load channel class
Each channel class list are identified by the name and contains the list of classes describing the load.

classList.description: The class list contains the classes describing the load. The loading is the combination of all load channel classes, therefore, duplicates are possible.

className.description: Channel name extended by "-class". In case of rainflow counting, the extention is from-class and to-class.

urn_samm_io.catenax.classified_load_spec.description: Several load channel classes  are sorted in a list. For rainflow counting, a load channel has two channel class lists, from-class and to-class.
Name of countings, "Counts" or "Time"  or "revolutions".
Counts of loads in the respective loadingclass. might be event counts, time counting or revolution counts - depending on the CountingMethod and CountingUnit
List of counts according to the load channel lists.

countsName.description: Name of the counted value: "Counts" or "Time" or" Revolutions"

countsList.description: List of counts according to the load channel lists.

urn_samm_io.catenax.classified_load_spec.description: Set for channelclasses and counts

classes.description: Several load channel classes  are sorted in a list. For rainflow counting, a load channel has two channel class lists, from-class and to-class.

counts.description: List of counts according to the load channel lists.

urn_samm_io.catenax.classified_load_spec.description: Component or assembly the load spectrum is valid for. A ZF_lrd counted load spectrum  belomgs to a gear set while a temperature load spectrum belong to the part where the temperature is measured (gear oil or IGBT).

urn_samm_org.eclipse.esmf.samm_character.description: Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

urn_samm_io.catenax.classified_load_spec.description: Mileage of the vehicle respectively part.

urn_samm_org.eclipse.esmf.samm_character.description: Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.

urn_samm_io.catenax.classified_load_spec.description: Operating hours for the vehicle respectively part.
Status describes the date when this aspect is filled, the according mileage and according operating time.

mileage.description: Mileage of the vehicle respectively part.

operatingHours.description: Operating hours covered by the load spectrum.

urn_samm_io.catenax.classified_load_spec.description: All information decribing the source, purpose and application of the load spectrum.

componentDescription.description: Component or assembly the load spectrum is valid for. A ZF_lrd counted load spectrum  belomgs to a gear set while a temperature load spectrum belong to the part where the temperature is measured (gear oil or IGBT).

routeDescription.description: Information on the route which the load spectrum is representing. For example "city munich heavy trailer" or "motorway light trailer agil driver".

urn_samm_io.catenax.classified_load_spec.description: Asset ID of the specific parent: vehicle or gearbox or battery
Channelname extended by -class
List of load-classes not defining a closed hysterese.
Rainflow counting is restricted to one channel. Unclosed hystereses are described as list of classes.

residuumClassName.description: Name of the load channel extended by -class

residuumList.description: List of load-classes not defining a closed hysterese.

header.description: Information on the classified load spectrum including kind of classificationen, Classes, Limits

body.description: List of load channel classes and corresponding counts

metadata.description: all information decribing the source, purpose and application of the load spectrum.

residuum.description: Residuum of load history i case of rainflow counting
